description.value:
While raging, the barbarian deals normal damage to incorporeal creatures even when using nonmagical weapons. She also gains a +3 morale bonus to touch AC, which increases by 1 at 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter (to a maximum of +7 at 20th level). This canâ€™t raise her touch AC above her full AC..

A barbarian must be at least 6th level before selecting this rage power.
